description:
Enjoy Birkenstock comfort and style year-round. The Boston Clog adds a closed-toe design to the classic Birk platform. The upper is extra-thick oiled nubuck that feels soft and looks great. Arch support and a deep heel cup cradle you through every step.

  • Smooth, durable leather upper
  • Slip-on style with adjustable straps
  • Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management
  • Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet
  • Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing
  • Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural steps
  • EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks
name: Birkenstock Boston Leather Clogs - Unisex
